We are a premier inbound DMC based in the southeast hub of the United States, Atlanta, GA. We differentiate ourselves by providing excellent customer service with the professionalism you expect at competitive prices for the highest quality in service.

Discover Destinations embraces a business philosophy emphasizing the importance of honor, integrity, and individual character. Staff members are passionate about the travel services we offer, at the same time seeking creative ways to make international connections that contribute significantly to a positive and a sound business environment for all.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|4px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”1.4em”]

Travel with us & feel pampered; come, be intimate with your spouse on your tailored honeymoon package or enjoy a romantic getaway in the Caribbean, Hawaii, India, Dubai or one of the many exotic destinations worldwide.

animation_direction=”%22fade_in%22″ animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”]

EDUCATIONAL TOURS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|off%22%22″ admin_label=”Discover Beatuty Text” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” custom_padding=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”300ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”]

At Discover Destinations we believe that our future is in the hands of our children. Schools and colleges provide an excellent source of education. However, we help school going children and college going youth experience the real world. Our professional tour organizers can customize your educational tours to fit your needs and help you weave your curriculum into your tours.

Some of our achievements include certifications from Kennedy Space Center as well as Houston Space Academy. We are also proud ambassadors of U.S Space & Rocket Center in Huntsville Alabama. Last year we serviced hundreds of satisfied students with an experience to last a lifetime.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/ff-8qead8h4.jpg” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_margin=”260px||||false|false” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” animation=”fade_in”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_padding=”37px||6px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_margin=”-3px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Discover Beatuty Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” min_height=”63px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”%22fade_in%22″ animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”]

Sports travel

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|off%22%22″ admin_label=”Discover Beatuty Text” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” min_height=”688px” custom_padding=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”300ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”]

Are you passionate for sports?

For all the sports fans out there, welcome to the exciting vacation of sports holidays. We serve all kinds of fans from boxing, baseball, hockey, football, NASCAR, golf, horse racing, soccer, tennis swimming, basketball, cricket to name a few. Discover your passion for sports with a consultant at Discover Destinations. We pride ourselves in low prices, great quality, and reliable customer service. We want to make this a pleasant memory of a lifetime for all our clients. We will cater to all your travel needs and organize the game tickets, transportation and overnight stays in perfectly located hotels.
Corporations can use these sports travel packages as an award for top performing employees, incentives to sales agents, customer appreciation, Christmas bonuses and retirement gifts to name a few.

All teams are different and hence we know that your needs are unique to you. At Discover Destinations we will plan out a schedule and package to your satisfaction and expectations. We will handle all your transportation, hotel accommodations and other tour operations leaving your team to concentrate on the game.

Contact us for all your sports travel queries for various events including but not limited to Olympics, Summer and Winter games, US Open, Super Bowl, Pro Bowl, The Masters, Daytona 500, Kentucky Derby, etc.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_padding=”108px||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Golf-Pic.jpg” title_text=”Golf Pic” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ min_height=”548px” custom_margin=”90px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” animation=”fade_in”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ min_height=”830px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|14px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”37px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em”]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
